description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 13 June 2017 (RN 16/09212/FULL) for the use of the building as seven (7) residential flats, insertion of roof lights and courtyards to lower ground floor level, secondary glazing to the front elevation at lower ground, ground and first floors, and replacement windows to the rear elevation at ground, first and mezzanine levels, together with associated internal alterations, plant, waste and cycle storage, and hard landscaping to the rear. Linked to land use swap with Macintosh House, Beaumont Street (RN16/09208/FULL).  (Linked to 16/09213/LBC) from RN 16/09212/FULL, NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to enable the relocation of the cycle storage from the front vaults to new secure cycle storage lockers at the rear.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
